docs.text: This site exists as a landing place for how-to guides and explainers.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Links ¶ Basic Syntax | Markdown Guide Regular Expressions Cheat Sheet VSCode find and replace using regex Examples ¶ Remove duplicated words ¶ 1 2 3 4 \b(\w+)\s+\1\b \b(\w+)(?:(?![\n\r])\s)+\1\b ----replace---- $1 Find Missing collation ¶ 1 \[?(var)?char\]?\s*\(\d+\)\s+(?!COLLATE) Find all [char] (2), char (2) etc ¶ 1 2 3 4 5 6 (cono(?!lang)\w*\]?) +(\[?(n?var)?char\]? *)\(2\) (\[?\w*(cid)\w*\]? +\[?)(char\]? *)\(10\) (\[?\w*(?<!vm)(oid|order)(?!type|cono)\w*\]? +\[?)(var)(char\]? *)\((? !10)\d\d\) ----replace---- $1 $2(4) (cono[\]]? *[\[]?[nvar]*char[\]]? *\()2 Replace all foreign key references schema ac ¶ 1 2 3 (references [\[]?)ac ----replace---- $1dbo replace all like dsq columns from (var)char (¾) to varchar(10) ¶ 1 2 3 (\[?\w*dsq\w*\]? +\[?)(n?var)?(char\] *)\([3-4]\) ----replace---- $1var$3(10) replace all keys names ¶ 1 2 3 (alter table.*add +constraint +[\[]?)(\w+)([\]]?.*) ----replace---- $1$2_DMS$3 remove all indexes ¶ 1 CREATE *(\w*)? *\w* *INDEX.* Lookarounds ¶ ?= is positive lookahead and ?! is negative lookahead ?<= is positive lookbehind and ?<! is negative lookbehind remove roles except LangService ¶ 1 GRANT +[a-z]+ +ON +\[.+\].\[.+\] +TO +\[(?!LangService)[\w]+_role\] look for all ownerid except topownerid ¶ 1 (?<!top)ownerid\]? +\[?(var)?char\]? *\(8\) remove use xlink ¶ 1 (?<!--)use +[\[]?xlink exclude strings with LangId ¶ 1 2 3 [^LangId] char\(2\) ----replace---- $14 Escape special characters in PowerShell ¶ 1 [Regex] :: Escape ( $regexStr )

docs.text: ?= is positive lookahead and ?! is negative lookahead ?<= is positive lookbehind and ?<! is negative lookbehind
docs.title: Lookarounds
look for all ownerid except topownerid

docs.text: Links ¶ The 30 Basic Vim Commands Vim Cheat Sheet A Great Vim Cheat Sheet surround.vim plugin Split terminal ¶ :term - open terminal in split window CTRL+ww - for switching between split windows Tweaks ¶ vimcolorschemes Override colorscheme highlighting vim-plug ¶ junegunn/vim-plug: Minimalist Vim Plugin Manager Install vim-plug 1 curl -fLo ~/.vim/autoload/plug.vim --create-dirs https://raw.githubusercontent.com/junegunn/vim-plug/master/plug.vim vim-plug commands 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 " install plugin : PlugInstall vim - surround " upgrade vim-plug itself : PlugUpgrade " update plugins : PlugUpdate " check the status of plugins : PlugStatus

docs.text: junegunn/vim-plug: Minimalist Vim Plugin Manager Install vim-plug 1 curl -fLo ~/.vim/autoload/plug.vim --create-dirs https://raw.githubusercontent.com/junegunn/vim-plug/master/plug.vim vim-plug commands 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 " install plugin : PlugInstall vim - surround " upgrade vim-plug itself : PlugUpgrade " update plugins : PlugUpdate " check the status of plugins : PlugStatus
